metadata.title: USN-4047-2 -- libvirt update vulnerability
metadata.description: USN-4047-1 fixed a vulnerability in libvirt. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   Matthias Gerstner and JÃ¡n Tomko discovered that libvirt incorrectly handled  certain API calls. An attacker could possibly use this issue to check for  arbitrary files, or execute arbitrary binaries. In the default  installation, attackers would be isolated by the libvirt AppArmor profile.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4047-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libvirt0 - 1.2.2-0ubuntu13.1.28+esm1 libvirt-dev - 1.2.2-0ubuntu13.1.28+esm1 libvirt-doc - 1.2.2-0ubuntu13.1.28+esm1 libvirt-bin - 1.2.2-0ubuntu13.1.28+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
